comment: /** * Returns the next input split that shall be consumed. The consumer's host is passed as a parameter * to allow localized assignments. * * @param host The host address of split requesting task. * @param taskId The id of the split requesting task. * @return the next input split to be consumed, or null if no more splits remain. */
code: /** * Returns the next input split that shall be consumed. The consumer's host is passed as a parameter * to allow localized assignments. * * @param host The host address of split requesting task. * @param taskId The id of the split requesting task. * @return the next input split to be consumed, or null if no more splits remain. */ InputSplit getNextInputSplit(String host, int taskId).
